name: Crude Ax
description: An improvised ax created from basic materials found on the beach. Not very useful.

name: Standard Ax
description: An ax constructed from average materials. It works.

name: Crude Spear
description: A spear constructed from basic materials. You can use it to poke things.

name: Crude Bow
description: A basic bow with basic arrows for doing basic things.

name: Strong Bow
description: A bow capable of firing arrows at greater speeds to deal greater damage.

name: Torch
description: A stick which has been lit on fire to aid in your dark adventures.
